content.html:
AF/MF SETTING (Movie Recording)

SUBJECT DETECTION SETTING


Options are the same as those for still photography, but settings
must be adjusted separately (□ 158).

The camera automatically switches to continuous AF when SUBJECT
DETECTION ON is selected for AF AF/MF SETTING > SUBJECT
MF
DETECTION SETTING, even if SINGLE AF is selected for FOCUS
MODE. Subject detection is not available during manual focus,
even when SUBJECT DETECTION ON is selected for SUBJECT
DETECTION SETTING.

AF+MF



Options
ONOFF
Select ON to enable manualfocus in SINGLE AF and CONTINUOUS
AF modes. Manual focus can be suspended by pressing the AFON
button.

MF ASSIST


OptionDescription
FOCUS PEAK HIGHLIGHTThe camera heightens high-contrast outlines. Choose a color and peaking level.
FOCUS METERA needle indicates whether focus is in front of or behind the subject.
FOCUS METER + PEAK HIGHLIGHTFocus is indicated by both a meter and peak highlights.
OFFFocus is displayed normally (MF assist cannot be used).
Choose how focus is displayed when MANUAL FOCUS is select-
ed for FOCUS MODE (□ 102).

content.markdown:
AF/MF SETTING (Movie Recording)

# SUBJECT DETECTION SETTING

Options are the same as those for still photography, but settings
must be adjusted separately (□ 158).

The camera automatically switches to continuous AF when SUBJECT
DETECTION ON is selected for AF AF/MF SETTING > SUBJECT
MF
DETECTION SETTING, even if SINGLE AF is selected for FOCUS
MODE. Subject detection is not available during manual focus,
even when SUBJECT DETECTION ON is selected for SUBJECT
DETECTION SETTING.

AF+MF

Select ON to enable manualfocus in SINGLE AF and CONTINUOUS
AF modes. Manual focus can be suspended by pressing the AFON
button.

| Options | Options |
| --- | --- |
| ON | OFF |


MF ASSIST

Choose how focus is displayed when MANUAL FOCUS is select-
ed for FOCUS MODE (□ 102).

| Option | Description |
| --- | --- |
| FOCUS PEAK HIGHLIGHT | The camera heightens high-contrast outlines. Choose a color and peaking level. |
| FOCUS METER | A needle indicates whether focus is in front of or behind the subject. |
| FOCUS METER + PEAK HIGHLIGHT | Focus is indicated by both a meter and peak highlights. |
| OFF | Focus is displayed normally (MF assist cannot be used). |


209

6

Shooting

content.html:
OptionDescription
FOCUS PEAK HIGHLIGHTThe camera heightens high-contrast outlines. Choose a color and peaking level.
FOCUS METERA needle indicates whether focus is in front of or behind the subject.
FOCUS METER + PEAK HIGHLIGHTFocus is indicated by both a meter and peak highlights.
OFFFocus is displayed normally (MF assist cannot be used).

| Option | Description |
| --- | --- |
| FOCUS PEAK HIGHLIGHT | The camera heightens high-contrast outlines. Choose a color and peaking level. |
| FOCUS METER | A needle indicates whether focus is in front of or behind the subject. |
| FOCUS METER + PEAK HIGHLIGHT | Focus is indicated by both a meter and peak highlights. |
| OFF | Focus is displayed normally (MF assist cannot be used). |
